Renewals

Lesson
objectives

¢ Describe the renewal process in PolicyCenter
at a high level

¢ Describe a simple business renewal flow

¢ Explain how pre-renewal works in
PolicyCenter

Marci
Configuration
Developer

| need to know how renewal works so | can
configure PolicyCenter in a way that fits the
client’s requirements.

| Renewals

eoe

New policy term

¢ The renewal process begins before the current term expires
¢ Renewals extend policies into a new term

¢« Renewals are configurable

| Starting renewals

Automatic I ; [4
Manual Sg

New policy term

* Commonly starts automatically (default)

« May be started manually

| Processing renewals G

Automatic
Manual

New policy term

¢ Fully automatic renewal by the renewal workflow

* Some renewals may be referred for end user review

| End results of a renewal job

(rl tal E

Renewed
Non-renewed
Not taken

New policy term

¢ Renewed: policy continues for another term
¢ Non-renewed: insurer decides not to renew

¢ Not taken: insured chose not to renew

| Renewal wizard: user interface renewal i

++
o+

. Edit View Billing Bind
bisinreninl > [EZ contract fed Quotec » | rome » info [lag Renewal
enew

¢ Used for manual renewals

¢ Used for referred renewals (policy will change on renewal)

Marcus
Business
Analyst

What if | need to override the automated
renewal? Can | enter a pre-renewal direction to
put the expiring term into automated
non-renewal or manual renewal?

Gi

Marci
Configuration

Developer _. .
The requirement | have says to configure a pre-

renewal direction, but | don’t know how that
| d works in the base configuration.

‘ie

| Pre-renewal direction i

Renewed
eo4 Non-renewed
Not taken

New policy term

Auser can override the default Automated Renewal by entering a pre-renewal
direction in the expiring term which puts the renewing term into Automated Non-
Renewal or Manual Renewal.

| Pre-renewal direction i

¢ Pre-renewal direction is specified in PolicyCenter as a special set of instructions
detailing how to renew the policy

* Generally, the pre-renewal will be non-renew, not taken or referred

¢ Apolicy can have only one active pre-renewal direction

| Demonstration G

Pre-renewal direction

Automated renewal i

Renewal Workflow workflows

Reaches effective

Automatic date of the new term

Has pre-
renewal
direction

Transaction
(optional)

Changes

Renewed

Issue now

Question

_~ — What are the three ways that a renewal job can end?

4
¢
¢

SoS oD DD DDS De Say

Answer

ae What are the three ways that a renewal job can end?

¢
¢

Renewed, non-renewal (when the insurer chooses not to renew the policy) or not
taken (when the insured chooses not to renew the policy).

Sop DD DD SDSS oe

Question G

,— — Under what two circumstances is the renewal wizard typically used?

4
¢
¢

SoS oD DD DDS De Say

Answer a

,~ — Under what two circumstances is the renewal wizard typically used?

¢
¢
¢

The renewal wizard is typically used when the renewal is started manually or when the
policy must be changed at renewal time.

Sop DD DD SDSS oe

Question

,~ — Consider a situation where the insured is offered a renewal, but never
x makes the payment. What is the renewal’s state? HINT: The renewal flow
times out.

SoS oD DD DDS De Say

Gi

Answer

/~ — Consider a situation where the insured is offered a renewal, but never
x makes the payment. What is the renewal’s state? HINT: The renewal flow
: times out.

The renewal flow does time out, and the renewal term is Not Taken.

Sop DD DD SDSS oe

Gi

Question

,~ — How many pre-renewal directions can a policy have?

4
¢
¢

SoS oD DD DDS De Say

Answer

,~ — How many pre-renewal directions can a policy have?

¢
¢
¢

A policy may have any number of pre-renewal directions, but there is only one active
pre-renewal renewal direction at a time .

Sop DD DD SDSS oe

Question

,~ — When should you not create a pre-renewal direction?

4
¢
¢

SoS oD DD DDS De Say

Answer

,~ — When should you not create a pre-renewal direction?
¢

¢
¢

You should not create a pre-renewal direction if you want to renew the policy and do
not need human review of the job while it's being executed.

Sop DD DD SDSS oe

¢ Explain how pre-renewal works in
